Articles.Content: Ok so here is my first thread on the forums . Well kind of. On the last one I couldn't get the images to work, but now I have a imgur account. What you see below is a Mun rover that I made for Jeb to ride around in. Delivery was pretty straight forward. It's pretty stable (as far as things on the Mun go), but it doesn't get over 20 m/s.

A more compact rover that houses 2 kerbals, can right itself, can climb steep angles, RTG/solar powered with 3 Z-300 batteries and 1 Z-100 battery, and completed with headlights. (turn torque off on the probe{on the underside of the rover} when traveling)

craft file:http://www./view/w3v3ey2pdu33bgk/IZON_rover_4.craft

Can climb angles over 30 degrees:

If flipped it has its probe torque and landing leg to right side itself:

Eeloo: performs nicely. (works best on the Mun)
both rovers are great! but the first design looks awesome!
Plus it looks a whole lot easier to get to your extraterrestrial bases XD
